title: National Pinot Noir Day – Social Feed
description: Square-format poster for Jubilee Inn celebrating National Pinot Noir Day. Deep burgundy leather-textured background with golden vintage vineyard illustration, ornate serif typography, and elegant decorative flourishes. Designed for Instagram feed visibility with a luxurious wine-label aesthetic.

title: National Pinot Noir Day – Story
description: Vertical story-format poster variant for Jubilee Inn’s National Pinot Noir Day. Tall composition with rich leather-textured background, detailed golden engraving of a vineyard estate, and refined serif lettering. Optimized for Instagram Stories with a premium, timeless wine-inspired look.

title: National Prosecco Day – Social Feed
description: Social feed poster for Jubilee Inn’s National Prosecco Day. Black-and-gold palette with a popping champagne bottle, glitter confetti, and elegant display typography; centered layout optimized for square feed visibility.

title: National Prosecco Day – Story
description: Vertical story-format variant of the National Prosecco Day campaign for Jubilee Inn. Sleek champagne flute splash, tall composition for swipe-through engagement, and a refined serif/sans pairing for high-contrast legibility.

title: The Huckleberry Finns – Social Feed
description: Live music feed poster promoting The Huckleberry Finns at Jubilee Inn. Cool blue gradient with performance photography, clean hierarchy for act name/date/time, and modern sans-serif typography for a fresh, upbeat tone.

title: The Huckleberry Finns – Story
description: Story-format live music poster for Jubilee Inn featuring The Huckleberry Finns. Vertical crop of the vocalist with airy blue gradients, stacked text for quick scanning, and clear event details optimized for mobile.

title: Jubilee Inn Live: Sarah-Jane Lovell
description: Concert poster design for a live performance at Jubilee Inn featuring singer Sarah-Jane Lovell. Ornate gold frame with a teal stage panel, soft spotlight glow, and classic pub-poster aesthetic for a premium, timeless mood.

title: Beer Day – Story
description: Playful Instagram story celebrating Beer Day at Jubilee Inn. Bright amber/yellow palette with a beer-mug icon, bubbly texture, bold condensed headline, and a badge-style callout for the event details.

title: Portfolio Project 02
description: Minimalist promotional poster with bold sans-serif typography and a clean monochrome palette, emphasizing clarity and modern design sensibility.

title: Portfolio Project 03
description: Event flyer design with warm gradient background, playful script headlines, and layered texture effects for a vibrant, energetic mood.

title: Portfolio Project 04
description: Sophisticated advertisement layout using a muted pastel scheme, refined serif type, and balanced white space for an elegant, high-end feel.

title: Portfolio Project 05
description: Dynamic promotional artwork with diagonal text placement, high-contrast colors, and a textured overlay to convey movement and excitement.

title: Portfolio Project 06
description: Seasonal event poster featuring floral illustrations, a soft spring color palette, and hand-drawn typography for a friendly, inviting aesthetic.

title: Portfolio Project 07
description: Bold nightclub poster with neon color accents, geometric patterns, and condensed sans-serif type to create an energetic nightlife vibe.

title: Portfolio Project 08
description: Modern infographic-style poster integrating icons, modular grid layouts, and contrasting color blocks for clear, visual storytelling.

title: Portfolio Project 09
description: Concert flyer with moody lighting effects, monochrome band photography, and grunge-textured type to evoke an underground live music feel.

title: Portfolio Project 10
description: Product promotion poster highlighting a central hero image, sleek gradients, and fine-line decorative elements for a polished commercial appeal.

title: Portfolio Project 11
description: Charity event poster using a heartwarming image, rounded typefaces, and pastel tones to convey compassion and community spirit.

title: Portfolio Project 12
description: Minimalistic corporate flyer with structured grid alignment, muted blues, and sharp sans-serif fonts for a professional presentation.

title: Portfolio Project 13
description: Food festival poster featuring rich, appetizing imagery, rustic textures, and script headline fonts to evoke a homely, gourmet vibe.

title: Portfolio Project 14
description: Holiday celebration poster with red-gold palette, ornamental vector illustrations, and decorative serif fonts for a festive atmosphere.

title: Portfolio Project 15
description: Theatrical show poster with dramatic shadows, large display typography, and vintage-inspired framing for a classic stage feel.

title: Portfolio Project 16
description: Conference promotional design with clean vector icons, structured layouts, and corporate blue tones for clarity and professionalism.

title: Portfolio Project 17
description: Summer beach party flyer using vibrant tropical colors, palm tree silhouettes, and playful display fonts for a lively seasonal tone.

title: Portfolio Project 18
description: Art exhibition poster with abstract paint textures, minimalistic typography, and a muted earth-tone palette for a gallery-ready look.

title: Portfolio Project 19
description: Sports event poster with action photography, bold block lettering, and angled dynamic layouts to convey intensity and movement.

title: Portfolio Project 20
description: Local market poster using hand-drawn illustrations, earthy tones, and vintage-style lettering to evoke tradition and community.

title: Portfolio Project 21
description: Tech conference flyer with futuristic gradients, isometric shapes, and a minimalist sans-serif type system for a cutting-edge feel.

description: Film screening poster with cinematic lighting, dramatic serif headings, and high-contrast imagery for a bold, artistic mood.

description: Music festival poster with vivid color blocking, layered crowd silhouettes, and distressed typography to reflect energy and excitement.

title: Portfolio Project 25
description: Luxury brand advertisement with monochrome photography, gold accents, and a minimalist composition for a high-fashion editorial style.
